t1.name: Regular Red Apple
t1.description:
Apple, meet the world's favourite apple for snacks.

The heart-shaped delicious apple has a bright surface. This delicious apple shines in fresh, crisp salads, for its crunchy texture and lightly sweet taste.

product.minidesc: Sprite, a lemon-lime flavored soft drink

t1.name: Sprite (355mL Can)
t1.description:
Sprite, a lemon-lime flavored soft drink.

From the Coca-Cola Company, Sprite is one of the best-selling soft drinks in the world. Sprite also comes in 710mL bottles or 2L bottles.
